page.title: 16KIPPEN STREET FAYRE
page.content: Kippen holds its{Annual Street Fayre in{June.}It replaces the old{Kippen {Games}which were held on the{The {Glasgow Fayre Saturday}The Main street is decorated and lined with stalls from local groups and charities.It is opened by a local celebrity who crowns the{Gala Queen}and then judges the {Fancy Dress}competition.The stalls trade in the morning, then everything moves to the football park where the {displays}by the army, Fire brigade, Police dogs,Pipe bands and the school dancing team are given during the afternoon.{Tug o war}teams compete for the{Glentirran Cup}which is a relic from the old games.The day ends with a {Carnival dance}in the village hall.
